summary: Adds the Gear Stone and the Gear Matrix to the bandit Camp near the Guardian Stones, wich both give you the basic armors and weapon of the Vanilla Game (from Iron to Daedric)
descriptionHtml:
Tired of using console commands everytime you want something simple like a daedric armor or a dwarven greatsword? Want to test some Enchantment but lacking armor to enchant?

This mod is the solution.
It provides the Gear Stone and the Gear Matrix, which both deliver the basic items of the Vanilla game.

They are both located at the Bandit Camp near the Guardian Stones.

While the Gear Stone is only available in this location the Gear Matrix can be carried in your inventory and just needs to be activated (clicked on in the inventory) to provide the same menu and functions.

They Provide:
Weapons:
All Weapon Types + Arrows for:
Iron, Steel, Dwarven, Orcish, Ebony and Daedric Weapons

All Armor Parts and Shields for:
Hide, Fur, Iron, Leather, Steel, Dwarven, Elven, Orcish, Scaled, Steel Plate, Ebony, Glass, Dragonplate and Dragonscale Armors

This mod is my first attempt at scripting so don\'t jugde it to harsh.

*sorry for my bad english, it\'s not my native language*

Thanks to:
- Bethesda for Skyrim and their Tutorials for the Creation Kit
author: xMaster2072
